actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to provide that real property owned by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall be subject to local code requirements in the same way as privately owned property.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Provides, under the National Housing Act, that real property owned by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development is subject to local code requirements in the same way as privately owned property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to provide that real property owned by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall be subject to local code requirements in the same way as privately owned property.
